title: Flipped Learning Design for Language Learning Utilizing Productive Failure

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Practical Application Experience
context.additional_context: Focus on Enhancing Language Proficiency to Improve Work Efficiency for Current Practitioners, Emphasizing Real-Time Collaboration and Problem-Solving Activities Using Digital Devices (Laptops/Tablets)

learning_goals: Learners can derive creative problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy in given language problem scenarios.
Learners can improve initial failure cases at least three times based on peer feedback and propose a final solution.
Learners can demonstrate pre-class preparedness by utilizing over 90% of pre-learning materials (videos/reading materials) in a flipped learning environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
